sentence.Network_en: According to local folklore it is an evil place.
sentence.Network_cn: 据当地民间传说，那是个不祥的地方。

sentence.Network_en: The story rapidly became part of family folklore.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个故事很快就成为家族传说的一部分。

sentence.Network_en: Local folklore has it that prehistoric men drove cattle over these cliffs.
sentence.Network_cn: 当地民间传说中称,史前人类把野牛从这些悬崖上驱赶下去.

entry.def: Folklore is the traditional stories, customs, and habits of a particular community or nation.

example.ex: In Chinese folklore the bat is an emblem of good fortune.
example.tran: 在中国的民间传说中蝙蝠是好运的象征。

sentences.en: According to popular folklore, anyone who owns such a picture will have bad luck.
sentences.cn: 民间盛传拥有这样图画的人会遭厄运。

sentences.en: Local folklore has it that prehistoric men drove cattle over these cliffs.
sentences.cn: 当地民间传说中称，史前人类把野牛从这些悬崖上驱赶下去。

sentences.en: The victory became part of sporting folklore.
sentences.cn: 那次胜利已成为人们津津乐道的体育传奇故事。
